Consumes one Coin to place a Champagne Bomb on a deployable and passable tile within attack range. The Champagne Bomb deals 140% of ATK as Physical damage to the first enemy it touches and Slows the target for 2 seconds
After on the field for 3 seconds, the Champagne Bomb deals an additional instance of damage; When using this skill, Coin limit: 3

Attacks hit twice and obtains one Coin when defeating an enemy; When the skill is deactivated, consumes all Coins to attack random enemies within the frontal tile, dealing 80% of ATK as Physical damage and knocks them back slightly for each consumed Coin
Unlimited duration, can manually deactivate skill; When using this skill, Coin limit: 10

elite_levels.description: Obtains 1 Coin each time DP is consumed by Trait during skill duration (can be used for skills)
Obtains 1 Coin each time DP is consumed by Trait during skill duration (can be used for skills), and ATK +3% (stacks up to 5 times)
Obtains 1 Coin each time DP is consumed by Trait during skill duration (can be used for skills), and ATK +4% (stacks up to 8 times)

potential_upgrades.description: Obtains 1 Coin each time DP is consumed by Trait during skill duration (can be used for skills), and ATK +3% (stacks up to 6 (+1) times)
Obtains 1 Coin each time DP is consumed by Trait during skill duration (can be used for skills), and ATK +4% (stacks up to 9 (+1) times)

elite_levels.description: When receiving fatal damage, if there are enough DP, consumes 5 DP to restore 70% HP, and doubles the cost each time this effect is triggered

potential_upgrades.description: When receiving fatal damage, if there are enough DP, consumes 5 DP to restore 80% (+10%) HP, and doubles the cost each time this effect is triggered
